nodes.text: Illoria Daze was a female gill-singer who hailed from the planet Hetzal Prime. She was able to vibrate her vocal apparatus to sing melodies in a six-part harmony. Daze became famous across the Galactic Republic during the High Republic Era, eventually leaving Hetzal and moving to Alderaan. Her uniquely appealing wit and backstory that involved transition from poverty to wealth contributed to her fame. Scantech Merven Getter considered Daze to be the Hetzal system's biggest claim to fame prior to the Great Hyperspace Disaster.
